projects.title: Feedo - Get Anonymous Feedback
projects.description: A platform to get anonymous feedback from your friends, colleagues, or anyone. Share your feedback link and receive honest opinions.

projects.title: Gravity - Reimagine Hostel Living
projects.description: Gravity is one of the best hostel management systems that simplifies the management of hostels, mess, and student accommodations. It gives AI-powered insights to optimize operations.

projects.title: Access - English Access Scholarship Program
projects.description: Platform that showcases the Learning, Activities, and Events of the English Access Scholarship Program conducted by the US Embassy. It has features like event galleries, Activities and resource sharing.
